bibl.title: Isis, Eggheads, and Roman Portraiture.
bibl.note: Harvard University Art Museums Inv. 1983.69. Portrait head in Marble (H. 0.243 m) of an Isiac priest, early second century. Comparison with other priestly portraits of the Late Egyptian, Hellenistic and Roman periods.
bibl.seg: Wood Susan, Isis, Eggheads, and Roman Portraiture.

Harvard University Art Museums Inv. 1983.69. Portrait head in Marble (H. 0.243 m) of an Isiac priest, early second century. Comparison with other priestly portraits of the Late Egyptian, Hellenistic and Roman periods.
